summary: This bill, the "Freeze AEWR and Restore Monetary Sense Act" (also known as the FARMS Act), aims to temporarily freeze the Adverse Effect Wage Rate (AEWR) for agricultural guest workers. Specifically, it authorizes the Secretary of Labor to maintain the AEWR at its current level for two years if a valid calculation method isn't available. This applies to nonimmigrant workers admitted under the H-2A visa program.
